snippet.title: Ghostrunner | Official Reveal Trailer 2019 | (PC, PS4, XBOX)
snippet.description:
Ghostrunner is an action FPP video game developed by One More Level studio and published by All in! Games. High mobility of the main character, one-hit-one-kill, and bullet-time mechanics are the bases of the gameplay, which focuses on fast-paced, high-adrenaline combat. The game is set in a world which is a unique, grim blend of cyberpunk and post-apo genres. Coming to PC, XBOX, PS4.

#RTXon: Experience the stunning visuals of the tower-city with ray tracing technology and immerse into the dark futuristic world of Ghostrunner. #PC #PS4 #Xbox

Watch the gameplay: https://youtu.be/_Fwmb5kvkOs
Add to wishlist on Steam http://bit.ly/SteamGhostrunner !

Developed by One More Level
Co-Developed by Slipgate Ironworks
Produced by 3DRealms
Published by All in! Games

Follow on social media:
Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/ghostrunnerthegame/
Twitter: https://twitter.com/GhostrunnerGame

Follow the creators - One More Level:
Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/omlgames
Twitter: https://twitter.com/oml_games
You Tube: https://youtube.com/user/onemorelevelSA

Follow the publisher - All in! Games:
Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/allingamespub
Twitter: https://twitter.com/allingamespub
#gamescom2019 #Ghostrunner
